description: This file is a C header file declaring API functions for the Beep Environment Controller Object, including creation, removal, registration, and initialization functions. It does not contain implementations, only prototypes and associated documentation.

methods.name: BeepCreateEnvController
methods.description: Prototype for creating a Beep Environment Controller object.

methods.name: BeepEcoCreate
methods.description: Prototype for creating a Beep Eco object.

methods.name: BeepEcoRemove
methods.description: Prototype for removing a Beep Eco object.

methods.name: BeepEcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Prototype for enrolling objects in the Beep Eco object.

methods.name: BeepEcoInitialize
methods.description: Prototype for initializing the Beep Eco object.
